scripts.build-local: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && yarn clean && webpack --config webpack.config.local.js && cd ../aegis/wasm && yarn deploy && curl -s http://localhost/reload
scripts.build-cache: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && yarn clean-cache && webpack --config webpack.config.cache.local
scripts.build-github: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && yarn clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.new-model: git commit -a -m test && yarn build-local && yarn open-reload
scripts.webswitch: cd ../aegis-host ; export SWITCH=true ; export PORT=8888 ; yarn start
scripts.build-all: cd ../aegis && yarn build && cd ../aegis-host && yarn build && cd ../aegis-scaffold && yarn build-local
scripts.new-model-v2: git commit -a -m test && yarn build-local && open -u http://localhost/reload
